name: filter_bands
description:
Allows to extract one or multiple bands of multi-band raster image collection.
Bands can be chosen either by band id, band name or by wavelength.

imagery and at least one of the other arguments is required to be specified.

bands.description: string or array of strings containing band ids.

names.description: string or array of strings containing band names.

wavelengths.description: Either a number specifying a specific wavelength or a two-element array of numbers specifying a minimum and maximum wavelength.
